properties.areaDesc: Lafayette, MS; Marshall, MS; Union, MS
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 6:51PM CST until February 14 at 10:42AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Coldwater River...Tallahatchie
River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Little Tallahatchie Canal at Etta near New Albany
* from Thursday February 13 until Friday February 14.
* At 6 PM Wednesday the stage was 24.6 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 26.5 feet on Thursday February 13.
* Flood stage is 25.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Thursday February 13 and
continue to rise to near 26.5 feet by Thursday February 13.The
river will fall below flood stage by Friday February 14.
* At 26.0 feet...County Highway 47 near Mud Creek and Mill Creek has
6 to 12 inches of water over it. Several thousand acres of crop
land are flooded.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
